serverSide.entities

Class KitchenClientProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverSide.entities.KitchenClientProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChefCloning, WaiterCloning, java.lang.Runnable

    public class KitchenClientProxy
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ChefCloning, WaiterCloning
    Service provider agent for access to the Kitchen. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
